channel.title: How to make npcs talk?
channel.description: How do i make a npc talk out loud so i can make it say somthing

item.title: How to make npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

i just told you, add a

if (npcs[i].npcType == 28) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "txt here"; } }[code] For that npc.[/code]

item.title: How to make npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

that’s how he talk’s go up to npc 209, and he’ll say that

And autospawn.cfg.
here’s an example.

spawn = 553	2540	4716	0	0	0	0	0	1	skillin shop

553 is npc, 2540, and 4716 are x/y co-ords and 0’s are if you want it to walk

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

ok i see like one of em has this this
if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { // nulodian - black armour shopkeeper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “THANKS FOR JOINING!”;

ok i see would the ‘‘THANKS FOR JOINING’’ be the text?
and also if i spawn a npc in the server hpw would i make him talk thx?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 09:38:39 PM[/size][hr]how do i make a npc talk?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs talk?
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

open npchandler.java, and search for something like.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 28) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "txt here"; } }
DIFFERENT TEXT
AND THIER YOU HAVE IT.

Read full topic
